name: Qwilfish

abilities.name: Balloon Sting
abilities.text: Once during your opponent's turn, if Qwilfish is your Active Pokémon and is damage by an attack (even if Qwilfish is Knocked Out), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Nerve Shot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: It shoots the poison spines on its body in all directions. Its round form makes it a poor swimmer.
